reviews.text: Fantastic hotpot place! The meat quality was top tier, the service was quick, and the atmosphere was relaxing. I would definitely recommend it here!
Poor food quality and poor service. I would not go again.

I come here quite often for happy hour (M-F 3-5pm). Nothing really beats $6 pho! The pho is pretty good, but there isn't anything that really stands out. Also the service is a bit slow at times, but not terrible.
I was skeptical at first, but overall I was very pleased with the quality! It's a great price for AYCE hot pot with great meat and sauce selection.
It was decent. Nothing special, but also not bad.
